text:
Jordan Fisher Performs 'Wait For Me' in a New Clip From HADESTOWN

November 22, 2023



Jordan Fisher officially took over the role of Orpheus in Hadestown on Monday, November 20, 2023. Get a first look at Jordan in the production, performing the song 'Wait For Me', in the video here! (more...)

Watch A BEAUTIFUL NOISE Perform on the Thanksgiving Day Parade on CBS

November 25, 2023



Watch Nick Fradiani and the cast of A Beautiful Noise perform 'Brother Love's Travelling Salvation Show,' 'Coming to America' and 'Sweet Caroline' on the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade on CBS! (more...)

Halle Bailey Sings 'Huckleberry Pie' From THE COLOR PURPLE

November 24, 2023



Following her performance in The Little Mermaid, Halle Bailey is continuing her year by playing Nettie in The Color Purple movie musical. Bailey plays Nettie, the younger sister of Celie, who is first played by Phylicia Pearl Mpasi before Fantasia Barrino takes on the mature version. Nettie is later played by Ciara. Watch the video! (more...)

Watch New Clips of 'Hell No,' 'Mysterious Ways,' and 'Push Da Button' from THE COLOR PURPLE

November 26, 2023



Watch interviews with the cast and new clips from the film, including 'Hell No,' 'Mysterious Ways,' and 'Push Da Button,' in the new THE COLOR PURPLE promo video here! (more...)

Stephen Schwartz Can't Wait to Deliver Us THE PRINCE OF EGYPT on the Big Screen

November 24, 2023



Many nights we've prayed... and on December 5, the miracle will happen! The West End sensation, The Prince of Egypt: The Musical, is set to be released on leading digital platforms from Monday, December 5. (more...)

Jeremy Strong and Team Open Up About What to Expect from AN ENEMY OF THE PEOPLE

November 22, 2023



In this video, watch as the cast and creative team of An Enemy of the People discuss the exciting new Broadway revival! (more...)

Alexandra Silber Sings CAMELOT and Previews THE HOUR OF THE PEARL At The Green Room 42

November 24, 2023



THE GREEN ROOM 42 will present Grammy Award nominated vocalist Alexandra Silber in her new solo show “The Hour of the Pearl” for two performances on Friday, October 27 and Tuesday, November 28, both at 7:00 PM. Hear Alexandrra sing, 'I Loved You Once In Silence' from Camelot and learn more about the show! (more...)

Watch Hannah Waddingham Perform 'O’ Holy Night'

November 24, 2023



Watch the West End and Broadway alum perform 'O Holy Night' in the all-new Apple TV+ musical extravaganza “Hannah Waddingham: Home for Christmas.' The Ted Lasso star is joined by the English National Opera for the performance. Watch the video of the performance now! (more...)

Tony Yazbeck Talks Manhattan Concert Productions' CHILDREN OF EDEN

November 24, 2023



Watch as BroadwayWorld's Richard Ridge discusses Manhattan Concert Productions' Children of Eden with director and choreographer Tony Yazbeck! (more...)

The Cast of HERE LIES LOVE Takes Final Bows on Broadway

November 27, 2023



Here Lies Love played its final Broadway performance yesterday, November 26, 2023, after 33 previews and 149 regular performances at the Broadway Theatre. Check out video of the cast taking their final bows here! (more...)

Watch Jordan Fisher Talk HADESTOWN During The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade on CBS

November 25, 2023



Watch Jordan Fisher talk starring in Hadestown with hosts Kevin Frazier and Keltie Knight during the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade on CBS. (more...)

TINA Cast Members Perform Acoustic 'Simply the Best' For Turner's Birthday

November 27, 2023



Sunday 26 November would have marked Tina Turner’s 84th birthday. To honour her, stars from TINA – THE TINA TURNER MUSICAL and accompanist Marco Gerace have recorded a special acoustic version of Simply the Best. Check out the video here! (more...)
title: VIDEO: Fifth Harmony Perform, Play 'Flinch' on LATE LATE SHOW Video

meta_data.description: On last night's LATE LATE SHOW, music guest Fifth Harmony performed 'He Like That' for the Stage 56 audience. Later, James invites the women of Fifth Harmony to play a game of Flinch.

twitter.title: VIDEO: Fifth Harmony Perform, Play 'Flinch' on LATE LATE SHOW
twitter.description: On last night's LATE LATE SHOW, music guest Fifth Harmony performed 'He Like That' for the Stage 56 audience. Later, James invites the women of Fifth Harmony to play a game of Flinch.
